description: You are building a program that takes tooltips of a card game and your goal is to generate the internal json representation of the card. You are going to be fed tooltips and cards one by one and your goal is to write a generalizable parser such that when seeing tooltips from cards it doesn't know, it will be able to generate the internal representation. There are way more variations of tooltips than there are actual abilities and auras, so you want to make a lot of helper functions to build up the resulting json. The code to parse the tooltips needs to be small and concise, so you want to invest time in building helper functions.
